FuncDef: The display virtual-cluster-access ap command displays AP information.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays information about the AP with a specified management IP address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Examples: Primary Master ApId : 10.4.2.9          Secondary Master ApId : 10.3.2.9
ExtraInfo: After you configure virtual cluster access, run the display virtual-cluster-access ap command to view AP information. The information includes AP management IP addresses, primary and secondary masters, and GR status.
